# example 1: load = 1819 --> index = 4 and speed = 37.3km/h
# custom power: 7.168 * 37.3 - 47.212 = 220.1
# imagic power: 6.867 * 37.3 - 35 = 221.1
# fortius power: 7.587 * 37.3 - 60,931 = 222.1
#
# example 2: grade = 4.59% and speed = 37.3km/h load=1819 --> index = 4 and speed = 37.3km/h
# custom power: index = 12 --> load = 4027 and resistance = 3460, 15.908 * 37.3 - 113.828 = 479.5
# imagic power: index = 12 --> load = 4027 and resistance = 3460, 13.300 * 37.3 - 82 = 414.1
# fortius power: index = 11 --> load = 3767 and resistance = 3350, 14.475 * 37.3 - 117.592 = 422,3
#

# reslist = [1900, 2030, 2150, 2300, 2400, 2550, 2700, 2900, 3070, 3200, 3350, 3460, 3600, 3750]
# grade:multiplier,additional
#
